sentence.Network_en: Once, she had been put off by his hauteur.
sentence.Network_cn: 她曾经对他的傲慢很反感。

sentence.Network_en: A deeper shade of hauteur overspread his features, but he said not a word.
sentence.Network_cn: 一阵傲慢的阴影罩上了他的脸, 可是他一句话也没有说.

sentence.Network_en: L 'é criture fut la seule chose à la hauteur de cette catastrophe d'enfant.
sentence.Network_cn: 写作是这不幸的孩子唯一能做的事情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... harried 受骚扰的>没烦恼的 hauteur 傲慢>谦逊 havoc 混乱>宁静.
...供以下参数： a) 偏倚于纤维断面积的平均长度，即豪特(Hauteur)长度，H； b) 豪特长度分布的变异系数CVH ； c) 同时偏倚于断面 …
...标准有两个,许多人对它们的理解不够.这两个标准是:豪特长度(Hauteur)和巴布长度(Barbe).一般地,毛纺工业同时采用豪特长度和巴布.

8月5日词汇:竞走,接力,跳高,跳远,撑杆跳高 Marche 竞走 Relai 接力 Saut en hauteur 跳高 Saut en longueur 跳远 Saut à la perche 撑杆跳高... 阅读全文.
Vole dans les hauteurs 在高空飞翔 Au dessus des capitales, 在城市的上空飞 Des idées fatales 带着将死的念头 Regardent l’océan... 俯瞰着海洋.

entry.def: You can use hauteur to describe behaviour which you think is proud and arrogant.

example.ex: Once, she had been put off by his hauteur.
example.tran: 她曾经对他的傲慢很反感。

means.word_mean: 1. overbearing pride evidenced by a superior manner toward inferiors

auth_sentence.content: In their hearts they must be humiliated by his languid hauteur.
auth_sentence.res_content: In their hearts they must be humiliated by his languid hauteur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In their hearts they must be humiliated by his languid hauteur.

auth_sentence.content: Philippe's hauteur, he says, is just right for this museum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Philippe's hauteur, he says, is just right for this museum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Philippe's hauteur, he says, is just right for this museum.

auth_sentence.content: It would be easy, and wrong, to accuse Sade of sterility and concealing feelings beneath a veneer of unflappable hauteur.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would be easy, and wrong, to accuse Sade of sterility and concealing feelings beneath a veneer of unflappable hauteur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would be easy, and wrong, to accuse Sade of sterility and concealing feelings beneath a veneer of unflappable hauteur.
